summary: This document contains corporate resolutions for NES, LLC, authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to act as a depositary, custodian, or investment advisor for the company. It lists authorized signers, including Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke, and outlines the powers granted to them regarding the management of accounts.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is listed as an authorized signer for NES, LLC, with the authority to manage accounts with Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is also listed as an authorized signer for NES, LLC, allowing him to manage accounts with Deutsche Bank.

connections.description: Darren Indyke and Jeffrey Epstein are both authorized signers for NES, LLC, indicating a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The document certifies corporate resolutions for NES, LLC, authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage accounts.
Darren Indyke and Jeffrey Epstein are named as authorized signers for the company.
The document outlines the powers granted to the authorized signers regarding account management.
It states that the bank may rely on the instructions of the authorized signers unless notified otherwise.
The resolutions have not been modified or amended since the date shown in the document.
